Articles.Content: I saw the trailer for it last night. The movie looks very promising, and somewhat freaky. What do you guys think of it?
I hope it will be good. Reminds me of both 2001 and 2010. Europa is also one of my favorite moons:)

I hope it will be good. Reminds me of both 2001 and 2010. Europa is also one of my favorite moons:)

Me too. Europa is the place most likely to have life on it. Similar to Laythe and Vall (how long until we can dig into Vall's surface and explore the underwater world under it)?
IMHO, it looks like a hard SF an actually good version of Prometheus, but with slightly less prequel and more gravity-centrifuges.
good to see more hard scifi films coming out.

Looks really interesting. I love hard sci-fi. The end of the trailer did make it seem like it might be just another monster horror film but with Hollywood advertising they'd probably have to up that sort of element in the trailer for mass appeal so who knows.

Edited May 19, 2013 by Kerbface
Easily my new favorite space movie. Confuses those who don't like nonlinear story lines. Defiantly NOT a horror movie. I'd say its a suspenseful crusade to find proof of life on Europa

Yep, it's not a horror movie at all. Not that I dislike sci-fi horror, but realistic movies about space travel are a rare and precious commodity.

If hard SF is your thing then Europa report won't disappoint you.
